column2: bcom ldan 'das padma'i bla ma dang / chos kyi tog dang / mar me mdzad dang / yon tan gyi tog dang / yon tan 'byung gnas dang / 'od zer chen po dang / drang srong lha dang / @6b dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / bden pa'i tog dang / rdo rje mkhregs dang / thams cad zil gyis gnon dang / gser mdog dang / shin tu mthor gshegs dang / byi ru'i rgya mtsho dang / me tog gi tog dang / gzugs bzang dang / spyan bzang dang / drang srong sbed dang / dmag tshogs las rgyal dang / mtho ba dang / me tog rgyas pa dang / mdzod spu gzi brjid dang / shin tu rgyas dang / 'od zer bzang po dang / bkra shis ldan dang / blta na bzang dang / sengge'i gzi brjid chen po dang / blo gros brtan pas byin dang / sos ka'i spos dri dang / bden pa'i phyogs grags rgya chen dang / 'od ldan dang / skar rgyal dang / 'jig rten mdzes dang / 'od rgya chen dang / rin chen grags dang / drag shul gzi brjid dang / rin chen gzi brjid dang / tshangs pa'i gzi brjid dang / sgra snyan dang / me tog bzang po dang / ri rab me tog dang / rab tu yid 'ong dbyangs dang / dge ba tshul bzang dang / rab tu 'dzum pa'i spyan dang / yon tan phung po dang / 'brug sgra dang / kha dog mdzes dang / tshe'i gzi brjid dang / ngom bag glang po'i 'gros dang / 'jig rten mngon par smon dang / dgra las rgyal dang / yang dag mchod dang / rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / @7a *// gser thub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis kyang sngon chad gsungs pa lags na; de bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba dang / sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po'i 'di'ang brjod pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcad pa dang / bdud thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi brtson 'grus brtsam pa bskyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'ang kun tu bstan pa'i slad du da bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /

column2: de bzhin du mchong pa dang / yi ge dang / lag rtsis dang / rtsis dang / grangs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs dang / rgyang nas phog pa dang / bang dang / tshar dang / rkyal dang / 'phong dpyad dang / glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang / rta rtsal dang / shing rta'i thabs dang / mda' gzhu'i thabs dang / brtan pa dang / mthu dang / dpa' ba dang / 'gyed stobs dang / lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang / zhags pa'i thabs dang / mdun du bsnur ba dang / phyir bsnur ba dang / bzur ba dang / 'dzin stangs dang / gom stobs dang / thor tshugs dang / gcad pa dang / dral ba dang / dbug pa dang / gzhig pa dang / gshegs pa dang / mi tshor bar 'phog pa dang / gnad du 'phog pa dang / sgra grags par 'phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dang / cho lo'i rtsad mo dang / snyan dngags sbyar ba dang / lam dang / ri mo dang / gzugs dang / gzugs kyi las dang / thabs kyi dpyad dang / me'i las dang / @130a *// rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / gar dang / glu dang / yi ge bklag pa'i mig 'or dang / gtam dang / bzhad gad dang / rtsed mo dang / bro dang / sgeg pa dang / phreng ba brgyu ba dang / rlung yab g-yab pa dang / nor bu tshon gyis bsgyur ba dang / gos tshon gyis bsgyur ba dang / mig 'phrul gyi cho ga dang / rmi lam gyi dpyad dang / bya'i skad dang / bud med kyi mtshan dang / skyes pa'i mtshan dang / glang po che'i mtshan dang / rta'i mtshan dang / ba lang gi mtshan dang / ra'i mtshan dang / lug gi mtshan dang / khyi'i mtshan dang / shes gsal dang / sgra nges par sbyor ba dang / nga ro sgyur ba dang / sngon gyi rabs dang / sngon byung ba dang / rig byed dang / lung bstan pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / yi ge lci yang dang / tshig sdeb pa dang / mchod sbyin gyi cho ga dang / skar ma'i lugs dang / grangs can gyi lugs dang / rnal 'byor gyi lugs dang / las kyi tshogs dang / bye brag pa'i lugs dang / nor gyi rig pa dang / phur bu'i lugs dang / chu'i lugs dang / lha ma yin gyi lugs dang / bya dang ri dvags kyi skad dang / gtan tshigs kyi rig pa dang / rgya skyegs kyi 'khrul 'khor dang / spra tshil gyi las dang / 'drub shur dang / brko gzhog dang / lo ma dra ba dang / spos sbyar ba la sogs pa'i sgyu rtsal 'jig rten pa dang lha'i @130b dang mi'i las 'das pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig column2: mi bskyod pa'i stabs dang / dbang po'i mchod sdong lta bu'i stabs dang / ri'i rgyal po lhun po ltar shin tu brtan pa'i stabs dang / mi dngom pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang / ya yo med pa'i stabs dang / 'che ba med pa'i stabs dang / rings pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang / sdod pa med pa'i stabs dang / 'khrugs pa med pa'i stabs dang / 'khyor ba med pa'i stabs dang / 'drud pa med pa'i stabs dang / zhum pa med pa'i stabs dang / ha cang mi sdod pa'i stabs dang / mi g-yos pa'i stabs dang / rtab rtab po med pa'i stabs dang / tshul du shis pa'i stabs dang / dri ma med pa'i stabs dang / dag ba'i stabs @220b dang / zhes sdang med pa'i stabs dang / gti mug med pa'i stabs dang / chags pa med pa'i stabs dang / sengge'i stabs dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stabs dang / klu'i rgyal po'i stabs dang / sred med kyi bu'i stabs dang / sa la mi reg pa'i stabs dang / rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i ri mo sa la snang ba'i stabs dang / sor mo dra bas 'brel cing sen mo zangs lta bu'i stabs dang / so sgra 'byin pa'i stabs dang / ri rdob pa'i stabs dang / mthon dman mnyam par byed pa'i rkang mthil gyi stabs dang / dra ba'i bar nas 'od zer phyung nas sems can la reg na bde 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang / padma dri ma med pa la gom pa 'dor ba'i stabs dang / sngon dag pa legs par spyad pa'i 'gros kyi stabs dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas sengge'i khri la bzhud pa'i stabs dang / rdo rje ltar bsam pa brtan zhing mi phyed pa'i stabs dang / ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad gcod pa'i stabs dang / bde ba thams cad bskyed pa'i stabs dang / thar pa'i lam ston pa'i stabs dang / bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa'i stabs dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs phas kyi rgol ba chos dang mthun pas tshar gcad pa'i stabs dang / mun pa'i ling thog dang nyon mongs pa sel ba'i stabs dang / 'khor @221a *//

column1: smaraNIyA codanI tozaNI premaNI akarkaSA agadgadA aparuzA acapalA SlakzNA maDurA karNa suKA kAya citta udbilya karaNI rAga doza moha kali kaluza vinodanI kalaviFka ruta svarA kuNAla jIvaMjIvaka aBinadita GozA dunduBi saMgIti ruta ravita nirGozavatI anapahatA satyA acCA BUtA brahma svaruta ravita nirGozA samudra svara vega niBA SEla saMGawwanavatI devendra asura indra aBizwutA gamBIrA duravagAhA namuci bala abala karaNI para pravAda maTanI siMha svara vegA haya gaja garjita GozA nAganirnAdanI meGa stanita aBigarjita svarA daSa diS sarva budDa kzetra sParaNI vineya sattva saMcodanI adrutA anupahatA avilambitA sahitA yuktA kAla vAdinI samayA anatikramaNI Darma Sata sahasra sugraTitA sOmyAH asaktA aDizWita pratiBAnA ekarutA sarva ruta racanI sarva aBiprAya jQApanI sarva suKa saMjananI mokza paTa saMdarSikA mArga saMBAra vAdinI parzad anatikramaNI sarva parzad saMtozaNI sarva budDa BAzita anukUlA
column2: tshig de ni kun shes par byed pa dang / rnam par shes par byed pa dang / rnam par gsal ba dang / mi chod pa dang / chags par byed pa dang / snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / snum pa dang / go bar byed pa dang / skul ba dang / tshim par byed pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / sha sha bo ma yin pa dang / mi brlang ba dang / mi brkam pa dang / 'jam pa dang / @232a *// snyan pa dang / rnar bde ba dang / lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa sel ba dang / ka la pingka'i sgra skad lta bu dang / bya ku na la dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pa sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu dang / rnga bo che dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyi nga ro dang ldan pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / bden pa dang / gsal ba dang / yang dag pa dang / tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pa'i gdangs lta bu dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / ri rdob pa'i sgra lta bu dang ldan pa dang / lha'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang pos mngon par bstod pa dang / zab pa dang / gting dpag dka' ba dang / bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i smra ba 'joms pa dang / sengge'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / rta dang glang po che'i sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu dang / klu sgra sgrog pa lta bu dang / 'brug zer ba'i sgra lta bu dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / rtab rtab po ma yin pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / mi bshol ba dang / 'tsham pa dang / rigs pa dang / dus su smra ba dang / dus las mi yol ba dang / chos brgya stong legs par brgyus pa dang / mnyen pa dang / thogs pa med pa @232b dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / skad cig gis skad thams cad sgrog pa dang / bsam pa thams cad shes par byed pa dang / bde ba thams cad skyed pa dang / thar pa'i lam yang dag par ston pa dang / lam gyi tshogs smra ba dang / 'khor las mi 'da' ba dang / 'khor thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang mthun pa ste /

column2: mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dang / dpa' ba dang / rgyal ba 'phags pa dang / skyes bu dang / skyes bu chen po dang / sman pa'i mchog dang / zug rngu 'byin pa chen po dang / sengge ltar mi bsnyengs shing spu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga' ba dang / glang po ltar thugs shin tu dul ba dang / dri ma gsum spangs pas dri ma mi mnga' ba dang / rig pa gsum brnyes pas mkhyen pa po dang / chu bo bzhi las brgal bas pha rol tu byon pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs gcig 'dzin pas rgyal rigs su gyur pa dang / sdig pa'i chos spangs pas 'jig rten gsum gyi bram zer gyur pa dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pas dge slong du gyur pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas dge sbyong du gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pa bsal bas gtsang spra can du gyur pa dang / rgyal mtshan ma bsnyal bas dpa' ba dang / stobs bcu mnga' ba'i shin tu stobs dang ldan pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas ltar chos rin po che thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rig nas byang chub kyi snying po logs su phyogs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do // 'di ni shing gi rgyal drung du //

column1: ced a acittena piSuna vacana vigarhaNa saMDi sAmagrI guNa varNa prakASana prayoga tvAt su Sukla dantaH iti ucyate dIrGarAtram kRzNa pakza parivarjana Sukla pakza kuSala upacaya kRzNa karma kRzNa vipAka parivarjana Sukla karma Sukla vipAka saMvarNanakzIra Boja suDA kRtaka kzIra miSra saMpradAna sumanA vArzikI DAnuskAri mAlA guNa puzpa dAma Sukla varNa kusuma anupradAna tvAt avirala dantaH iti ucyate
column2: yun ring po nas nag po'i phyogs yongs su spong ba dang / dkar po'i phyogs dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog pa dang / las nag cing rnam par smin pa'ang nag pa yongs su spong ba dang / las dkar zhing rnam par smin pa'ang dkar ba bsngags pa dang / 'o ma dang sbyar ba'i zas @339b dang / gos dkar po sbyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la rdo thal 'o ma dang / bsres pa pir gyis skud pa dang / me tog su ma na dang / barsha ka ra dang / dha nu ska ri'i phreng ba brgyus pa'i me tog gi chun po dang / me tog kha dog dkar po sbyin pa'i phyir tshems shin tu dkar ba zhes bya'o //

column1: dIrGarAtram ha asya uccawyana vivarjana Ananda karaNa vAc anurakzaNa Ananda karaNa vAc udIraNa para sKalita apara CidrA parimArgaNa sarva sattva samaci
column2: yun ring po nas 'phya ba dang / 'thing ba rnam par spong ba dang / kun dga' bar byed pa dang / tshig srung ba dang / kun dga' bar byed pa'i tshig brjod pa dang / gzhan gyi 'khrul pa dang / gzhan gyi skyon mi tshol ba dang / sems can thams cad sems mthun par yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / mnyam par sbyor ba dang / mnyam par chos ston pa brtan por yang dag par blangs pa yongs su mi 'dor ba'i phyir tshems thags bzang ba zhes bya'o //

column1: dIrGarAtram sarva sattva aviheWanA vihiMsana viviDa vyADi spRzwa upasTAna glAna BEzajya anupradAna tvAt sarva rasa arTikeByaH ca sarva rasa pradAna apiti ucyate
column2: yun ring po nas sems can thams cad la rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / rnam par mtho mi 'tsham pa dang / nad sna tshogs kyis thebs pa la rim gro byed pa dang / nad pa la sman byin pa dang / 'gron pa rnams la ro bro ba thams cad sbyin pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i phyir ro bro ba mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //

column1: dIrGarAtram anRta paruza karkaSa SAWya para kawuka para aBizaFginya priya paramarBa Gawwana vAc pari varjana mEtrI karuNA prayoga mudita aprAmodyakaiti ucyate
column2: yun ring po nas rdzun dang / tshig rtsub po dang / brlang po dang / g-yo dang / gzhan la gnod pa dang / gzhan 'khrug par byed pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / gzhan gyi mtshang 'dru ba'i tshig yongs su spong ba dang / byams @340a *// pa dang snying rje la sbyor ba dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bar byed pa dang / 'jam ba dang / snyan pa dang / mnyen pa dang / snying du 'thad pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po tshim par byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag la yang dag par sbyor ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i dbyangs lta bu zhes bya'o //

column1: dIrGarAtram mAtA pitR vat sarva sattva apratihata cakzu prayoga eka putra vat yAcanaka mEtrI kAruNya pUrvaMgama saMprekzaNa ajihmIkaraNa prasanna inditi ucyate
column2: yun ring po nas pha ma la bya ba dang 'dra bar sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i mig tu sbyor ba dang / bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du slong ba la byams pa dang / snying rje sngon du 'gro bas lta ba dang / spa gong bar mi byed pa dang / dad pa'i dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mi 'dzum par lta ba dang / sems can gzhan de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa brtan por yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir spyan mthon mthing du 'dug pa zhes bya'o //

column1: dIrGarAtram hIna cetaH vivarjana udAra vipula aDi mukti paripUraNa anuttara Darma Canda sattva samAdApana BRkuwI muKa vivarjana smita muKa sarva kalyAiti ucyate
column2: yun ring po nas blo gros dman pa dang / sems pa dman pa rnam par spong ba dang; rgya chen po dang / rlabs po che la mos pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / bla na med pa'i chos la mos pa la sems can yang dag par 'dzud pa dang / khro gnyer gyi bzhin rnam par spong ba dang / 'dzum pa'i bzhin dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gan du 'gro zhing mngon du phyogs pa'i sngon du 'gro bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams @340b cad gsog pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i 'dra ba zhes bya'o //

column1: dIrGarAtram sarva vAc doza vivarjana sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDa Darma BANaka apramANa guNa varNa saMprakASana taTAgata sUtra antali Kana vAcana pa tezAm ca DarmANAm arTa pada praBeda para sattva saMprApaNa kOSalya tvAt uzNIzAn avalokita mUrDaH iti ucyate
column2: yun ring po nas tshig gi skyon thams cad rnam par spong ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / chos smra ba thams cad kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa tshad med par brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde yi ger 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / rnam par shes par byed pa dang / chos de dag gi don dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba sems can gzhan la go bar byed pa la mkhas pa'i phyir ljags yangs pa zhes bya'o //

column1: dIrGarAtram mAtA pitR SramaNa brAhmaNa guru dakziNIyAnAm mUrDnAm caraNa tala praNipatana pravrajita vandana aBivAdana keSa avaropaNa suganDa tE
column2: yun ring po nas pha ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bla ma dang / sbyin gnas kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ba dang / rab tu byung ba la phyag 'tshal ba dang / gsong por smra ba dang / dbu skra sbed pa dang / steng du spos kyi 'bru mar 'thor ba dang / slong pa thams cad la phye ma dang / phreng ba brgyus pa dang / mgo rgyan sbyin pa'i phyir dbu gtsug tor dang ldan zhing spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba zhes bya'o; ;yun ring po nas gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin thams cad byed pa dang / sems can thams cad dge ba yang dag par len du 'dzud pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su bstan pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / chos smra ba rnams kyis mngags te phyogs rnams su 'gro ba dang 'ong bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub @341a *//

column1: sarva yAcanakeByaH cUrNa mAlya mAlA guNa mUrDa ABaraNa anupradAna tvAt vEdya
column2: sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / pha ma dang / bla ma dang / sbyin gnas thams cad la rim gro bya bar spos sna tshogs kyi 'bru mar dang / mar dang / sgron ma dang / mar me rnams kyis mun pa mun nag sel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa mdzes par byed du 'jug pa dang / 'o ma lta bu'i mdzod spus brgyan par byed pa dang / sems can gzhan byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'jug pas dge ba'i tshogs khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir smin mtshams kyi mdzod sbu mdzes par skyes shing /

column1: BrU maDye su jAta pradakziNa Avarta uttapta viSudDa varNa ABAsa UrNaH iti ucyate dIrGarAtram nirargala sarva yajQa yajana samAdapana sarva kalyANa mitra anuSAsanyanudDara Darma BANakAnAm dOtya prekzaNe diggamana AgamanA pariKedana sarva budDa boDisattva pratti ekabudDa Arya SrAvaka Darma BANaka mAtA pitR guru dakziNIyatamonDakAra viDamana tEla DRt iti ucyate

column2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i phyir phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya'o // gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa la mkhas pa dang / dman pa nyi tshe ba'i theg pa rnam par spong ba dang / theg pa chen po'i yon tan yang dag par sgrub pa'i stobs dang ldan pas stobs de la sbyor ba chog mi shes pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs @341b pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa zhes bya'o // 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu dang / rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa la mkhas pa dang / dman pa nyi tshe ba'i theg pa rnam par spong ba dang / theg pa chen po'i yon tan yang dag par sgrub pa'i stobs dang ldan pas stobs la sbyor bas chog mi shes pa zhes bya'o //

column1: atIta anAgata pratyutpanna karma sama AdAna hetu SovipAka SojQAna bala upeta tvAt atIta anAgata pratyutpanna sarva karma samAdAna hetu vipAka jQAna balaH
